remark.en: Student need to get the Advisor‘s approval  to take this course.(Please contact Advisor for exact class time and location.)
remark.ch: 須指導教授同意，正確上課時間及地點請洽各指導教授

goal.ch: 提供學生論文撰寫經驗

content.en: Each Advisor instructs students doing thesis research and writing

en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments
